original_text: The officers returned to the leaders of the priests and the Pharisees. The leaders asked their officers, ‘Why did you not bring Jesus here?’
korean_text: 아랫사람들이 대제사장들과 바리새인들에게로 오니 그들이 묻되 어찌하여 잡아오지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: to the leaders of the priests and the Pharisees
Why did you not bring Jesus here
